mapper.select: SELECT TX_ID AS txId, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_CHASU AS calleeChasu, CALLEE_GUBUN AS calleeGubun, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, SECURITY_CORP AS securityCorp, CALLEE_REQ_REASON AS calleeReqReason, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME AS calleeReqDatetime, ARRIVAL_DATETIME AS arrivalDatetime, ELAPSED_TIME AS elapsedTime, REPORT AS report, ACCEPT AS accept, REFUSE_REASON AS refuseReason FROM ATMS_SLA_10

SELECT TX_ID AS txId, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_CHASU AS calleeChasu, CALLEE_GUBUN AS calleeGubun, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, SECURITY_CORP AS securityCorp, CALLEE_REQ_REASON AS calleeReqReason, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME AS calleeReqDatetime, ARRIVAL_DATETIME AS arrivalDatetime, ELAPSED_TIME AS elapsedTime, REPORT AS report, ACCEPT AS accept, REFUSE_REASON AS refuseReason FROM ATMS_SLA_10 WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, CALLEE_CHASU = #{calleeChasu}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_SLA_10 WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, CALLEE_CHASU = #{calleeChasu}

UPDATE ATMS_SLA_10 SET CALLEE_GUBUN = #{calleeGubun}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, SECURITY_CORP = #{securityCorp}, CALLEE_REQ_REASON = #{calleeReqReason}, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME = #{calleeReqDatetime}, ARRIVAL_DATETIME = #{arrivalDatetime}, ELAPSED_TIME = #{elapsedTime}, REPORT = #{report}, ACCEPT = #{accept}, REFUSE_REASON = #{refuseReason} WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, CALLEE_CHASU = #{calleeChasu}

INSERT INTO ATMS_SLA_10 ( TX_ID, ERROR_DATETIME, CALLEE_CHASU, CALLEE_GUBUN, BRANCH_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, CORNER_CODE, CORNER_NAME, TERMINAL_NO, SECURITY_CORP, CALLEE_REQ_REASON, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME, ARRIVAL_DATETIME, ELAPSED_TIME, REPORT, ACCEPT, REFUSE_REASON ) VALUES ( #{txId}, #{errorDatetime}, #{calleeChasu}, #{calleeGubun}, #{branchCode}, #{branchName}, #{cornerCode}, #{cornerName}, #{terminalNo}, #{securityCorp}, #{calleeReqReason}, #{calleeReqDatetime}, #{arrivalDatetime}, #{elapsedTime}, #{report}, #{accept}, #{refuseReason} )
